Message:
Inside a large crater
lies the altar of sealing.

There, we save Her Holiness
from the demon controlling her,
and the power of the Staff
purges the final Curse.
At last, the world is saved...!

...No, something’s off.
Why was it so easy?

Don’t tell me...
the demons were waiting for
every Curse to be dispelled...?

For every Curse to
converge into one place...?

There are only
10 Witches of Qlipha
in the world,

and each one
possesses the power
of a guardian angel.

When such power to
protect the world inverts,
it becomes a power
that destroys—a “Curse.”

That means,
to take away a Curse...
is to take away
a “power to protect
the world...”

Suddenly, a power taking
the shape of ominous,
piercing spikes pours
out from me.

I hear Her Holiness
cry out in dread.

The altar of sealing shatters,
and something enters
my body.
